gotchas_discovered: Complex date handling for override expiration
Nested data fetching with multiple related tables
Managing multiple states for forms and modals

approach_outcome.feature_scope: Feature override management page for super admins

recommendations: Consider extracting complex data fetching logic into custom hooks
Add more robust input validation for form submissions
Implement client-side caching to reduce database calls
Create reusable components for badges and status indicators
Add more comprehensive error handling and user feedback mechanisms
